original_title: DP Education IT Campus adds 44th centre in Kundasale
original_body_lines: New centre can accommodate 2,100 students; total centres student base is 35,000
DP Education IT Campus yesterday opened a centre at Kundasale, Kandy capable of accommodating 2,100 students.
The centre has drawn applications from 2,500 students reinforcing the demand for IT education in the area.

DP Education IT Campus will train the 2,100 students on coding as well as English free of charge before offering them the opportunity to follow Moratuwa University full stack developer online program via open.uom.lk, as well as via the Ruhuna and Kelaniya universities.
DP Education is the education arm of the Dhammika and Priscilla Perera Foundation (DP Foundation) a not-for-profit organisation.
